alert.note: Alert for Logan; Simpson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 8:43PM EDT until June 30 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Logan County in south central Kentucky... Simpson County in south central Kentucky... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 743 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of Portland to 11 miles south of Russellville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Adairville, Black Jack, Neosheo, Dot, Geddes, Schley, Salmons, Schochoh, Middleton, and Schweizer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
